hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: BUILD_ARCH_NAME
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: input building arch type ,You can enter one of the list: [ x86, aarch64 ];

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: BASE_IMAGE_NAME

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e IMAGE_VERSION="latest" BUILD_IMAGE_PATH="ContainerImages/$BASE_IMAGE_NAME" TIME=$(date +%Y-%m-%d)
############################################################### cd $WORKSPACE
if [ ! -e distrobuilder ];then wget https://github.com/opensourceways/distrobuilder/releases/download/distrobuilder-1.0/distrobuilder chmod u+x distrobuilder && ./distrobuilder --version fi
if [ -e dirname.txt -o -e filename.txt ];then rm -f dirname.txt filename.txt fi
for i in $(ls -l ./openeuler/lxd/ |awk '/^d/ {print $NF}') do echo $i >> dirname.txt done
if [ -z `grep "$BASE_IMAGE_NAME" dirname.txt` ];then echo "base_image_name is not exist" exit fi
for i in `ls ./openeuler/lxd/$BASE_IMAGE_NAME/` do echo ${i%.*} >> filename.txt done
if [ -z `grep "$BUILD_ARCH_NAME" filename.txt` ];then echo "build_arch_name is not exist" exit fi
mkdir -p ./$BUILD_IMAGE_PATH/container cp -rf ./openeuler/lxd/$BASE_IMAGE_NAME/$BUILD_ARCH_NAME.yaml ./$BUILD_IMAGE_PATH/container sed -i "s|opensourceways|qinsheng99|g" ./$BUILD_IMAGE_PATH/container/$BUILD_ARCH_NAME.yaml
############################################################### cd ./$BUILD_IMAGE_PATH/container $WORKSPACE/distrobuilder build-lxd $BUILD_ARCH_NAME.yaml if [ ! -f lxd.tar.xz ] || [ ! -f rootfs.squashfs ];then echo "Building container files absence" exit fi cat > Dockerfile <<EOF FROM scratch COPY lxd.tar.xz / COPY rootfs.squashfs / CMD ["/fake-command"] EOF docker build -t swr.ap-southeast-1.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/playground-images/$BASE_IMAGE_NAME-container-test-$BUILD_ARCH_NAME:$IMAGE_VERSION . rm -f ./*
############################################################### if hash docker 2>/dev/null; then docker login -u ap-southeast-1@$DOCKER_USER -p $DOCKER_PASS swr.ap-southeast-1.myhuaweicloud.com else echo "docker is not installed." fi
docker push swr.ap-southeast-1.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/playground-images/$BASE_IMAGE_NAME-container-test-$BUILD_ARCH_NAME:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.ap-southeast-1.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/playground-images/$BASE_IMAGE_NAME-container-test-$BUILD_ARCH_NAME:$IMAGE_VERSION rm -f ./*
